title: The Forgotten War
description: President Trump and North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un are preparing to meet for a second nuclear summit. What has fueled the hostility between these two countries for decades? On this episode, we look back at the tangled history.

itunes:summary: What's fueled the hostility between the U.S. and North Korea? We look back at the tangled history.
